short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Register your worked hours throughout your day and get a nice overview afterwards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you also working on a thousand things at the same time and do you also occasionally scratch your head, wondering what you have done at the end of the day? Use this chrome extension to quickly enter how long you have worked on something before shifting your focus so afterwards you can get a nice overview.
